DOC.HEADLINE: OBITUARIES
DOC.TEXT: Dollahite , Eddie D. , 42 , of Santa Paula , owner of Santa Paula Wireline , an oil field service company.Pierce Brothers Stetler Mortuary , Santa Paula . Rives , Glenn E. , 89 , of Ventura , retired oil superintendent with Edgington Oil . Ted Mayr Funeral_Home , Ventura . Ventura County obituaries are published free_of charge as a public_service to readers . Obituaries are based on information provided by mortuaries .
